signature.description: True if the field is a signature

ggc_only.description: True if the field is only in gGC's

pgc_only.description: True if the field is on in pGC's

indexed.description: True if the field is must be indexed (defined for <50% of GC's and >4 byte object size)

init_only.description: True if the field is does not need to be stored in the GPC (is only used at initialization)

reference.description: True if the field is a reference
